quotes: Anyone telling you it's pointless to share your perspective is sharing their perspective.
Knowledge is learning something everyday. Wisdom is letting go of something everyday.
You can only lose something that you have, but you cannot lose something that you are.
When you say yes to change, you are choosing to navigate that path peacefully and happily and see where it takes you.
Don't ever save anything for a special occasion. Being alive is the special occasion.
Old age is like everything else. To make a success of it, you've got to start young.
Success is about creating value.
Prefer to be defeated in the presence of the wise than to excel among fools.
Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
Not all those who wander are lost.
Anyone who stops learning is old, whether at twenty or eighty. Anyone who keeps learning stays young.
Our view of the world is truly shaped by what we decide to hear.
Successful people are always looking for opportunities to help others. Unsuccessful people are always asking, 'What's in it for me?'
The older you get, the more you understand how your conscience works.
The heart wants what it wants. There's no logic.
Science can flourish only in an atmosphere of free speech.
Great things are not done by impulse, but by a series of small things brought together.
A thing constructed can only be loved after it is constructed; but a thing created is loved before it exists.
Where you are right now doesn't have to determine where you'll end up.
The fewer the words, the better the prayer.
Your heart is the size of an ocean. Go find yourself in its hidden depths.
Being a good example is the best form of service.
Rather than love, than money, than fame, give me truth.
Darkness cannot drive out darkness; only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate; only love can do that.
All cruelty springs from weakness.
Silence is sometimes the best answer
Scared people want comfort and certainty so they avoid failure. People living fully seek challenges because this is where they feel alive.
Keep true. Never be ashamed of doing right. Decide what you think is right and stick to it.
It's not what happens to you, but how you react to it that matters.
The destiny of man is in his own soul.
Conquer the devils with a little thing called love.
Just try to be the best you can be; never cease trying to be the best you can be. That's in your power.
Creativity is the greatest rebellion in existence.
Men are anxious to improve their circumstances but are unwilling to improve themselves; they therefore remain bound.
Fear, uncertainty, and discomfort are your compasses toward growth.
An ounce of performance is worth pounds of promises.
Nothing ever happened in the past that can prevent you from being present now; and if the past cannot prevent you from being present now, what power does it have?
There are dark shadows on the earth, but its lights are stronger in the contrast.
I love fools' experiments. I am always making them.
Happiness is pretty simple: someone to love, something to do, something to look forward to.
The best teacher is experience and not through someone's distorted point of view.
Imagination is the true magic carpet.
Don't blame others. it won't make you a better person.
You must be willing to do what others won't do, to have what others won't have.
Giving back involves a certain amount of giving up.
Normality is a paved road: It's comfortable to walk,? but no flowers grow on it.
If you focus on results and finding shortcuts, you'll get impatient. If you focus on the process and doing the right thing, you'll be unstoppable.
Ancient Rule of Twenty-one: if you do anything for twenty-one days in a row, it will be installed as a habit.
It's only after you've stepped outside your comfort zone that you begin to change, grow, and transform.
A clear conscience is the sure sign of a bad memory.
